abstract: NBA Roundup; Brooklyn Nets beat Phoenix Suns, 94-91; other pro basketball scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Brook Lopez had 23 points for the Nets, who also won consecutive games for the first time this season.

headline.main: Nets Edge Suns to Win Fourth in a Row at Home
headline.print_headline: Nets Edge Suns to Win 4th in a Row at Home

snippet: Brook Lopez had 23 points for the Nets, who also won consecutive games for the first time this season.
